name: kansan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Kansas: I'm really proud of being a Kansan. Kansans are very competitive.
More examplesFewer examplesObama is the son of a Kenyan and a Kansan.He's a Kansan who has that all-American boy appeal.About 300,000 Kansans have no insurance

belonging or relating to the US state of Kansas or its people: "We love your Prime Minister," said a Kansan businesswoman recently. We began our trip in the small Kansan town of Kinsley.
More examplesFewer examplesHer studies will focus on Kansan poets.Obama was born in Hawaii to a white Kansan mother and an African father.An outbreak of anthrax in Kansan cattle could devastate American beef farmers.
